TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenParameters extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定 類別，可在實作之後表示安全性權杖參數。

span.span: Specifies an class that when implemented represents security token parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖參數會提供安全性繫結項目所需要的權杖的相關資訊，例如，權杖型別、簽發者等。Security token parameters provide information about the tokens (for example, token type, issuer, and so on) required by the security binding element. 衍生自這個類別的安全性權杖參數類別是權杖屬性及方法的集合，而且會用於建立各種不同的安全性繫結項目和權杖。The security token parameter classes derived from this one are a collection of token properties and methods, and are used in creating different kinds of security binding elements and tokens. 並非所有的屬性都和衍生類別有關。Not all of the properties are relevant to all derived classes. 例如，在核發的權杖 (SAML 權杖) 案例中， 就沒有任何關聯。For example, the has no relevance in an issued token (SAML token) case. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範這個類別的自訂覆寫*CreditCardTokenParameters*。The following code shows a custom override of this class called *CreditCardTokenParameters*. [!code-csharp[c_CustomToken#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customtoken/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[c_CustomToken#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customtoken/vb/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些多載之間的差異就是執行個體屬性值的來源。The difference between these overloads is where instance property values come from. 會將這些差異設定成它們的預設值， sets them to their default values. 則是從輸入參數所參考的執行個體中取用這些差異值。 takes them from the instance referenced by the input parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 方法符合核心設計模式。The and methods follow the Core design pattern. 在此模式中，這個方法會執行某種驗證，然後呼叫 ，而這是一個要在衍生類別中覆寫以執行核心功能的 `abstract` 方法。In that pattern, this method performs some validation and then calls , which is an `abstract` method that is overridden in derived classes to perform the core functionality.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得值，這個值表示權杖是否具有非對稱金鑰。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the token has an asymmetric key.

value.span: 如果權杖具有非對稱金鑰，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the token has an asymmetric key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非對稱金鑰會用於公開金鑰加密中，而這種加密方式會使用兩種在數學上相關的金鑰：公開金鑰和私密金鑰。Asymmetric keys are used in public-key cryptography, which uses two keys, a public key and a private key, which are related mathematically. 公開金鑰會廣泛地散發，但是私密金鑰則不會公開。The public key is distributed widely, but the private key is kept secret. 在公開金鑰加密中，不需要交換共同金鑰。In public-key cryptography, there is no need to exchange a common key.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, initializes a security token requirement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 權杖需求是當做輸入提供給安全性權杖管理員，以便為權杖取得安全性權杖提供者或安全性權杖驗證器。The token requirement is provided as input to the security token manager to obtain a security token provider or security token authenticator for the token.

summary.span: 取得或設定權杖參考樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the token reference style.
The reference style for the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 權杖參考樣式會指定如何參考 SOAP 訊息中的權杖。The token reference style specifies how to refer to the token in the SOAP message. 這個屬性會傳回列舉的成員，這個列舉會設定由訊息中的簽章及加密項目產生安全性權杖的安全性權杖參考 (STR) 時所需使用的參考樣式。This property returns a member of an enumeration that sets the desired referencing style that is used to generate security token references (STR) to the security tokens from the signature and encryption elements in the message.

exception.span: 已設定 () 無效的權杖參考樣式。

span.span: An invalid token reference style was .

member this.RequireDerivedKeys : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否可以從原始的證明金鑰衍生金鑰。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether keys can be derived from the original proof keys.

value.span: 如果必須從權杖的金鑰衍生金鑰，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if keys need to be derived from the token's key; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks WCF，就必須執行簽章和加密的權杖時，從權杖的金鑰衍生金鑰。WCF needs to derive keys from the token's key when performing signature and encryption using the token. 衍生金鑰的來源是「安全對話」，其中會有共用的安全性內容，可讓相同的安全性套用在對話中的所有訊息。Derived keys originate in Secure Conversations where there is a shared security context so that the same security can be applied across all messages in the conversation. 安全性內容權杖包含共用密碼，這個密碼會用於訊息簽署和加密。A security context token involves a shared secret, which is used for message signing and encryption. 共用秘密可以用來建立衍生的金鑰。The shared secret is used to create derived keys. 為了在某段長時間的對話過程中，維持一貫連續的高度安全性，您可以定期建立新的衍生金鑰。To maintain a high level of security through a lengthy conversation, new derived keys can be created periodically.
